LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.0.label: A just execution
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.0.description: A convict died, convict is up for dinner!
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.1.label: euthanasia
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.1.description: Somebody was euthanized, not in the amidst of violence... We should have cut the stomach open and hung it on the wall at the very least!
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.2.label: execution
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.2.description: There was an execution. We will have a new dinner menu.
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.3.label: organ harvesting
LanguageData.KnowGuestExecuted_B.stages.3.description: I harvested and killed someone! Will I be able to use what I harvested?
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.0.label: Know Colonist Executed
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.0.descript: A convict died, convict is up for dinner!
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.1.label: colonist euthanasia
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.1.descript: Our comrade was euthanized, not in the amidst of violence... We should have cut the stomach open and hung it on the wall at the very least!
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.2.label: colonist execution
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.2.descript: A comrade was executed, despite the complete capability to stand on the battle field. Oh well, the hive wanted it.
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.3.label: colonist organ harvesting
LanguageData.KnowColonistExecuted_B.stages.3.descript: I killed and harvested a comrade! If we use it, our comrade will be with us on the field, even in death!
LanguageData.KnowPrisonerDiedInnocent_B.stages.0.desc: An inncoent life was taken, I could have played with more!
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied_B.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.KnowColonistDied_B.stages.0.description: Our comrade died, and so will I. It's only the natural order.
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied_B.stages.0.label: Friend {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionDied_B.stages.0.descr: A friend died. I will be a bit loney, but death is inevitable.
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied_B.stages.0.label: Rival {0} died
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionDied_B.stages.0.descri: One who I often fought died! Death is a natural order, but who will fight me now?
LanguageData.ObservedLayingCorpse_B.stages.0.label: Observed Laying Corpse
LanguageData.ObservedLayingRottingCorpse_B.stages.0.d: The symbol of abundance rotted! What a waste!
LanguageData.Chocolate_Mood_B.stages.0.label: Ate Chocolate
LanguageData.Chocolate_Mood.stages.0.label: Ate Chocolate
LanguageData.ReleasedHealthyPrisoner_B.stages.0.label: Released Healthy Prisoner
LanguageData.ReleasedHealthyPrisoner_B.stages.0.descr: We let an intact prisoner out! We should have gotten more off of it!
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested_B.stages.0.label: Harvesting someone's organs
LanguageData.KnowGuestOrganHarvested_B.stages.0.descr: The hive harvested someone's organ. That someone is now one with the hive.
LanguageData.KnowColonistOrganHarvested_B.stages.0.de: I harvested an organ of our comrade. It is glorious to sacrifice the whole body, even if it was forced.
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested_B.stages.0.label: My Organ Harvested
LanguageData.MyOrganHarvested_B.stages.0.description: It feels like my body's missing something.
LanguageData.HadAngeringFight_B.stages.0.label: Had Angering Fight
LanguageData.KilledMyRival_B.stages.0.label: Killed My Rival
LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionLost_B.stages.0.label: Losing my rival {0}
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect_B.stages.0.label: Eating insect meat
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatDirect_B.stages.0.descripti: Soft, sticky, and slimey! Just like jelly!
LanguageData.AteInsectMeatAsIngredient_B.stages.0.des: Ate cooked insect meat, and it was soft, sticky, and slimey! Just like jelly!
LanguageData.AteCorpse_B.stages.0.label: AteCorpse
LanguageData.AteCorpse_B.stages.0.description: I ate a carcass that wasn't slaughtered! This is waste!
LanguageData.HarmedMe_B.stages.0.label: Hurt me
LanguageData.Insulted_B.stages.0.label: insulted
LanguageData.InsultedMood_B.stages.0.label: insulted
LanguageData.KindWords_B.stages.0.label: kind words
LanguageData.KindWordsMood_B.stages.0.label: kind words
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.0.label: Assigned to indoor operation for a while
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.0.description: I can't be on the battlefield on my feet, but who knows, maybe I will get lucky and get to confront enemy down here... Also, what I am doing is part of the war anyway!
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.1.label: on indoor operation duty
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.1.description: I can't be on the battlefield on my feet, but who knows, maybe I will get lucky and get to confront enemy down here... Also, what I am doing is part of the war anyway!
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.2.label: Switching operation
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.2.description: The operation site has been changed, and I got much to prepare.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.3.label: Switching operation
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.3.description: The operation site has been changed, and I got much to prepare.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.4.label: On field operation duty
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.4.description: Endless sky! Blind, deadly bullets! It's the best!
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.5.label: Assigned to field operation for a while
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors_B.stages.5.description: Endless sky! Blind, deadly bullets! It's the best!
LanguageData.DefeatedMechCluster_B.stages.0.label: Mechanoid outpost dissolved
LanguageData.DefeatedMechCluster_B.stages.0.descripti: We disintegrated all the moving machines! We made sure those BEEP-BOOPS were shut!
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.0.label: taking over the planet
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.1.label: Form Hive aggregation
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.1.description: Large Hive, Large battlefields, countless deaths. We're going to be very busy!
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.2.label: Form Hive cluster
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.2.description: I need to grow our Hive even more and run a bigger battlefield.
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.3.label: Form Hive outpost
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.3.description: Now it looks a bit like a Hive!
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.4.label: Laying the foundation for the Hive
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.4.description: We're laying the groundwork for the Hive!
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.5.label: Hive of nothing
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.6.label: noble Anty
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.6.description: Looks like something great has happened!
LanguageData.Expectations_B.stages.7.label: royal Anty
LanguageData.Nutritional_jelly.stages.0.label: Ate Nutritional jelly
LanguageData.Battlestimulation_jelly.stages.0.label: Ate Combat-stim jelly
LanguageData.TitleNoPersonalBedroom_B.stages.0.label: no personal bedroom
LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract_Mood.stages.0.label: my body is melting
LanguageData.AT_Aphidextract_Mood.stages.0.descriptio: Save me, help me, let me go home, I'm melting now, I feel like I'm on fire, save me, help me...I want to live!!!
